actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to treat as a prohibited transaction the failure to adhere to conditions of a determination letter relating to independent management of assets by a trustee or plan administrator.

summary.text: Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to treat as a prohibited transaction the failure to adhere to conditions of a determination letter relating to the independent management of assets by a trustee or administrator of a multiemployer employee benefit plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to treat as a prohibited transaction the failure to adhere to conditions of a determination letter relating to independent management of assets by a trustee or plan administrator.
